attributes.action: pass a law requiring Anthony John Corfield to legally change his name to Hercules McDangerfield.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, feel that the name "Anthony John Corfield" does not accurately convey the imposing presence, might, and overall greatness of the man himself. Therefore, we request that a law be passed requiring him to change his name to the much-more worthy "Hercules McDangerfield". Thank you.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
